subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Another Sony Walkman

full_text:

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

Frank,
 
Are you the thrift stores best customer???????
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 7/30/2008 1:40:13 P.M. Central Standard Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 
 
I found another older Sony Walkman--sports version at the thrift  store toay 
for $.99. The RCA version works way beyond expectations so far, I'm  making 
another wood box for it. 

Frank-S
